name: Territac
description: This game was made with windows forms and was created in spanish so I don’t remember how to change it because it was made some years ago. However, I’ll explain the game here: (Si hablas español puedes jugar el juego ya y leer el tutorial) first: you choose your character, each character has its own creatures with their elements, fire, water and nature, assuming you haven’t played Pokémon, fire defeats nature, nature defeats water, and water defeats fire, if a creature defeats another one that is effective against this one will be more resistant for the next encounter, if not, it disappears. If you are not satisfied with my explanation, better go and translate the tutorial in “Cómo jugar” section.
